attributes.action: Call for a complete crackdown on the new influx of racism since the EU outcome.
attributes.additional_details: We want the police to take a tougher stance on this before it escalates even further.
attributes.background: Many stories are coming through of racism actively being engaged in by a sector of our society. These have led to actual attacks, children being racially abused in school, vile comments on social media sites etc.
